keyPolicies.policyDescription: Since 1997, crime has fallen by almost 40 percent. There are now over 14,000 more police officers alongside nearly 16,000 Police Community Support Officers.
Labour is committed to providing a world-class education for every child. The rebuilding of Cressex School is just one example of Labour investing in our future.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A helping hand in hard times
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour has increased Child Benefit and Pension Credit to help families and older people through the recession whilst every 16 and 17 year old will have a place in school, college, training or an apprenticeship this September.
There are 7 Sure Start Children's Centres in Wycombe today thanks to Labour investment, giving our children the best chance of a good future. We need to make sure new centres are built as planned.
